EmailTemplate.name: DH AU Christmas and New Year Period 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Important ! Please reply or your restaurant will be closed over Christmas/New year
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
16/12/2015
Dear Restaurant - {!Account.Name},
Our website and Call Centre will be open throughout the coming Christmas and New Year Period and will be able to receive and send orders to your restaurant.
Please reply to this email to let us know:
A: If you will be OPEN for delivery between 22nd December and 4th January 2016 OR
B: If you will be CLOSED or not doing delivery between 22nd December and 4th January
C: If you intend to charge a public holiday surcharge. Please note our website is not able to add public holiday surcharges, so unfortunately we will have to close your restaurant for that day.
Please note that if we do not receive confirmation that you will be open, we will have to close your restaurant for the Public Holidays.
Alternatively, you may contact us at any time on our direct contact number 1300 46 4376
Yours Truly
Delivery Hero Customer and Restaurant Care
